title: Spring Festival
description: The annual Spring Festival is in full swing at the Kentfield Campus! Join us for live music, food trucks, and student club booths until 4:00 PM today.

title: Class of 2026
description: Relive the highlights of the Class of 2026 graduation ceremony. Congratulations to all our Mariners on their incredible achievements!

title: Library Update
description: We have installed twelve new individual study pods on the second floor of the library to provide a quiet, focused environment for finals week.

title: Soccer Victory
description: The Mariners secured a 2-0 victory against the visiting team last night. The defense was impenetrable, leading us to the regional playoffs!
